(Simplified: 剐)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 咼 indicates the sound; 刂 (knife) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 咼 [ guō ] to chat, to gossip, to jaw, to talk; mouth
    • 刂 [ dāo ] knife
①被尖銳的東西劃破：剮破。手上剮了一個口子。
②封建時代一種殘酷的死刑，把人的身體割成許多塊：剮刑(即“凌遲”)。千刀萬剮。
(Simplified: 剐)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 咼 indicates the sound; 刂 (knife) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 剐

Related Character(s): 骨, 別
Связанный символ (и): кость, не надо

剮字的基本解释

剮
guǎ
见“剐”。

剮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǎ］
［《廣韻》古瓦切，上馬，見。］
“冎1”的今字。“剐1”的繁体字。
(1)割肉离骨。
(2)引申为杀。
(3)古时分割人体的酷刑。凌迟的俗称。
(4)划破。

剮字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剮； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页142第20
【唐韻】【集韻】?古瓦切，音寡。【玉篇】剔肉置骨也。【說文】作冎。【廣韻】俗咼字。【正字通】本作冎。

cut
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǎ］
["Guangyun" Guvaqie, get on the horse, see you. ]
The present character of "冎1". "剐1" in traditional characters.
(1) Cut the meat from the bone.
(2) The extension is killing.
(3) Torture of dividing the human body in ancient times. Common name for Ling Chi.
(4) Scratch.
cut

[Subset 2] [Sword Department] 　剐; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 142-20
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Guwaqie, with few voices. 【Jade articles】Tick the meat and set the bones. 【Said the text】Make a mistake. 【Guangyun】vulgar word. 【Zhengzitong】This is a 冎.
